alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Benson and southwestern Ramsey Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Oberon, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Devils Lake, Camp Grafton, Lakewood Park, Fort Totten, Crary, Oberon and Doyon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
